scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Six Letters series includes correpsondence between Carolyn Reading Hammer and individuals involved in the production of a short book called called Six Letters. The book compiled by Boris Pasternak's wife, Lydia with the help of Carolyn Reading Hammer, discusses the correspondence between Boris Pasternak and Thomas Merton and the profound impact the letters had on each man's life. Much of the correspondence reflects the Hammer's effort to organize Merton's thoughts and rights for publication.
